name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation
display_help: Your mastery of Martial Combat allows you to draw on the physical energy stored within your body to perform remarkable feats. You deliver damage to your enemies via withering kicks and punches, while your preternatural senses keep you moving faster and striking harder than any who oppose you.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Build_Up_Proc
powers.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Ki_Push
powers.display_help: You smash your foe with a burst of Ki Energy, sending them flying through the air in slow motion. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Repel, KB

display_info: 8.3 magnitude knock on target after 2.05s delay
8.3 magnitude knock on target after 2.05s delay
5.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.33s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Storm_Kick
powers.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage, knocking them down. Storm Kick has an additional chance to cause your target to bleed for Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), DoT(Lethal), Foe Knockdown

display_info: 4 ticks of 5.56 lethal damage over 1.5s on target
4 ticks of 6.33 lethal damage over 1.5s on target
7.10% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.57s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Reach_for_the_Limit
powers.display_help: You are constantly looking for vulnerabilities in your foes' stances and positioning. Whenever you attack, you have a chance to gain a moderate +ToHit and +Damage bonus for a short duration.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Burst_of_Speed
powers.display_help: Channeling physical Ki inwards, you move more quickly than can be seen for an instant, allowing you to move instantly to a targeted location and strike at targets within melee range. You can use this Burst of Speed up to 3 times before it needs to recharge. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Location AoE Moderate DMG (Smash), Self Teleport

display_info: 2.60% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.5s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Dragons_Tail
powers.display_help: This low spinning kick deals moderate damage, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown

display_info: 75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
4.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Reaction_Time
powers.display_help: You attune yourself to the world around you, moving with preternatural speed. All enemies nearby move slowly and have reduced recharge, and you can absorb small amounts of damage every 2 seconds. When Reaction Time is deactivated, you gain a burst of speed for a short duration, increasing your own recharge and move speed. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle (PBAoE), Self Absorb over Time, +Recovery, Foe Rech, - Move, Special

display_info: -70.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 5s on target
-40.00% strength to recharge for 5s on target
-70.00% strength to jump height for 5s on target
-350.00% max run speed for 5s on target
70.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 10s on self
40.00% strength to recharge for 10s on self
350.00% max run speed for 10s on self
70.00% strength to jump height for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Inner_Will
powers.display_help: When pushed to your limit, you can tap into an inner reserve of power, allowing you to overcome impossible odds. When you are below half health, below half endurance, or the victim of any status effect, you may activate Inner Will. Inner Will cancels any status effects currently affecting you, increases your resistance to status effects by 100%, and increases the power of your own status effect-inducing powers. Inner Will also heals you for a moderate amount when activated. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 30s on self
0.5 magnitude confuse, magnitude terrorize, magnitude hold, magnitude immobilize, magnitude stun, magnitude sleep for 30s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Throw_Sand
powers.display_help: You grab some nearby debris and fling it towards a nearby foe, obstructing their vision and dazing them. Recharge: Long

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 3.0 stun for 9.54s on target after 0.25s delay
3.0 stun for 2s on target after 0.25s delay
2.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.57s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Martial_Manipulation.Eagles_Claw
powers.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw strikes so powerfully that it weakens your target's resolve, reducing their Range and Recharge for several seconds after attacking. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

display_info: -25.00% strength to range, recharge for 10s on target
16.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.03s on self
